roleset.name: admit

example.name: sentential thing arg1
example.text: Reviewing the company's scrape with disaster, Mr. Price conceded it had tried to do too much on its own.
example.arg: Reviewing the company's scrape with disaster
it had tried to do too much on its own

example.name: another
example.text: he conceded that with six kids, something like this was bound to happen.

roleset.name: acknowledge loss of a contest before it's official

example.text: ...the man who was so quick *PRO* to concede the first time to George W. Bush when he thought he lost...

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Andy Vidak seemed ready to run again for the district about 10 minutes after he conceded the election to Costa.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in CallHome. No relevant VN mapping.

roleset.name: to grant as right or privilege.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: They conceded a longer vacation to all employees.
